Package ohos.data.search.schema

Class DocumentItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.search.model.IndexData
      • ohos.data.search.schema.Schema<DocumentItem>
        • ohos.data.search.schema.DocumentItem

  • public final class DocumentItem
extends Schema<DocumentItem>
    Represents the index schema for document items.

    This schema is used to create indexes for document items. It supports index fields author, documentCategory, size, path, content, and all the fields in CommonItem. Among these fields, identifier is mandatory and can be set via the CommonItem#setIdentifier(String) method.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH
